alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Greene. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 903 PM CDT, gauge reports indicated Wilson Creek near Springfield is still in minor flood stage. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wilson`s Creek at Farm Road 150, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146 and Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Republic, Battlefield and Brookline. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
